text: Crimson Shore is a thriller novel by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child. The book was released on November 10, 2015, by Grand Central Publishing. This is the fifteenth book in the Special Agent Pendergast series. ==References== ==External links== *Official website * Category:American thriller novels Category:Novels by Douglas Preston Category:Novels by Lincoln Child Category:Literary collaborations Category:Sequel novels Category:2015 American novels Category:Grand Central Publishing books
title: Crimson Shore
